attributes.action: To negotiate with the real ideals of Brexit and Trigger Article 50 now not later
attributes.additional_details:
To mitigate open EU borders, immigration for non EU migrants have regulations imposed that discriminate against poorer areas and other nationalities, and weakened our ability to bring in talent. This needs to be reversed and the rules applied to all.

We vote for our government and expect them to make the decisions about how our country is run with the people as their concern, so trade deals, treaties, and agreements that erode this responsibility must be rejected. For peace in the UK leave now!
attributes.background: We the undersigned believe in immigration controls that are fair regardless of nationality. That trade deals should not require signing away border control or entering into TTIP or similar, does not require membership fees. That the only Laws we should follow are ones our country make.
